mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE TEMP_T_MGR_SYS_MENU ( MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , MENU_ID , UP_MENU_ID , AUTH_ID , LEVEL , PATH , CYCLE ) AS ( SELECT MENU_NM , MSM.MENU_ID AS CONNECT_BY_ROOT , MSM.MENU_ID , MSM.UP_MENU_ID , MSMA.AUTH_ID , 1 AS level , ARRAY[MSM.MENU_ID::TEXT] , FALSE FROM T_MGR_SYS_MENU MSM INNER JOIN T_MGR_SYS_MENU_AUTH MSMA ON MSM.MENU_ID = MSMA.MENU_ID AND MSMA.AUTH_ID = #{search.authId} WHERE UP_MENU_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT MSM.MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , MSM.MENU_ID , MSM.UP_MENU_ID , MSMA.AUTH_ID , LEVEL + 1 , PATH||MSM.MENU_ID , MSM.MENU_ID = ANY(PATH) FROM T_MGR_SYS_MENU MSM INNER JOIN TEMP_T_MGR_SYS_MENU TTMSM ON TTMSM.MENU_ID = MSM.UP_MENU_ID INNER JOIN T_MGR_SYS_MENU_AUTH MSMA ON MSM.MENU_ID = MSMA.MENU_ID AND MSMA.AUTH_ID = #{search.authId} AND NOT CYCLE ) SELECT LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || MENU_NM AS PADDED_MENU_NM , MENU_NM , CONNECT_BY_ROOT , TMSM.MENU_ID , UP_MENU_ID , LEVEL , PATH , AUTH_ID FROM TEMP_T_MGR_SYS_MENU TMSM INNER JOIN T_QCK_MENU_MGR QMM ON TMSM.MENU_ID = QMM.MENU_ID AND QMM.USER_ID = #{search.userId} ORDER BY PATH
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_QCK_MENU_MGR WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId} LIMIT 1 )
